rk_percentronecorrect.Description: Percent K responses with 1 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_tcacc.Description: Number of correctly identified colors (on R and K responses only)

rk_kwaccp.Description: number of correctly recognized pairwords per K response

rk_rtwocorrect.Description: number of items on which 2 features were recalled during validation when and Rresponse was given during recognition

rk_rcacc.Description: number of correctly recognized colors on R responses

rk_rwacc.Description: number of correctly recognized pairwords on R responses

rk_kcaccp.Description: number of correctly recognized colors per K response

rk_rrt.Description: mean reaction time for R responses

rk_ronecorrect.Description: number of items on which 1 feature was recalled during validation when and R response was given during recognition

rk_recso.Description: number of omissions on studied items

rk_krt.Description: mean reaction time for K responses

rk_kcacc.Description: number of correctly recognized colors on K responses

rk_konecorrect.Description: number of items on which 1 feature was recalled during validation when and K response was given during recognition

rk_rktwo.Description: number of items on which 2 features were recalled during validation when and R or Kresponse was given during recognition

rk_percentkzerocorrect.Description: Percent R responses with 0 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_recfp_k.Description: number of false positive K responses

rk_rzerocorrect.Description: number of items on which 0 features were recalled during validation when and Rresponse was given during recognition

rk_twacc.Description: Number correctly identified words (on R and K responses only)

rk_rcaccp.Description: number of correctly recognized colors per R response

rk_kzerocorrect.Description: number of items on which 0 features were recalled during validation when and Kresponse was given during recognition

rk_notrnotk.Description: number of omissions on studied items + number of omissions on unstudied items

rk_nsi.Description: Number of Studied Items (should be 60, unless task was terminated early)

rk_caccp.Description: Percentage of correctly identified colors (on R and K responses only)

rk_waccp.Description: Percentage correctly identified words (on R and K responses only)

rk_ktwocorrect.Description: number of items on which 2 features were recalled during validation when and Kresponse was given during recognition

rk_rkzero.Description: number of items on which 0 features were recalled during validation when and R or Kresponse was given during recognition

rk_kwacc.Description: number of correctly recognized pairwords on K responses

rk_percentrzerocorrect.Description: Percent K responses with 0 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_percentkonecorrect.Description: Percent R responses with 1 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_percentktwocorrect.Description: Percent R responses with 2 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_rkone.Description: number of items on which 1 feature was recalled during validation when and R or Kresponse was given during recognition

rk_encacc.Description: number of  correctly identified colored picture locations (left/right) out of 60 during encoding: can be useful in case of a crash

rk_recfp_r.Description: number of false positive R responses

rk_percentrtwocorrect.Description: Percent K responses with 2 features (pairword/color) recognized during validation

rk_rwaccp.Description: number of correctly recognized pairwords per R response

rk_recuo.Description: number of omissions on unstudied items
